sections.heading: Introduction to Augmented Reality
content: Augmented Reality (AR) overlays digital content onto the real world, creating immersive and interactive experiences for users.

sections.heading: Benefits
content: 2. **Visualization**: Helps visualize products in real environments.
3. **Innovation**: Sets your brand apart with cutting-edge technology.

sections.heading: Implementing AR
content: Use AR frameworks like ARKit (iOS), ARCore (Android), or WebXR (web). Ensure your design is user-friendly and accessible.
